    • NodePrinter

      public NodePrinter()

  • Method Details

    • print

      public boolean print(javafx.print.PrinterJob job, boolean showPrintDialog, javafx.scene.Node node)
      Prints the given node.
      Parameters:
      job - The printer job which has the configurations for the page layout etc. and does the actual printing.
      showPrintDialog - Whether or not the print dialog needs to be shown prior to printing.
      node - The content to print.
      Returns:
      true if everything was printed, false otherwise

    • getScale

      public double getScale()
      Returns a scale factor to apply for printing. A value of 0.72 makes 96 units in the world coordinate system appear exactly one inch long. The default value is 1.0.

    • setScale

      public void setScale(double scale)
      Sets a scale factor to apply for printing. A value of 0.72 makes 96 units in the world coordinate system appear exactly one inch long. The default value is 1.0.

    • getPrintRectangle

      public javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle getPrintRectangle()
      Returns the rectangle that will be printed. This rectangle determines the portion of the node to print in the world coordinate system.
      Returns:
      a rectangle in the world coordinate system that defines the area of the contents of the node to print.

    • setPrintRectangle

      public void setPrintRectangle(javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle printRectangle)
      Sets the rectangle that will be printed. This rectangle determines the portion of the node to print in the world coordinate system.
      Parameters:
      printRectangle - a rectangle in the world coordinate system that defines the area of the contents of the node to print.

    • getPrintInfo

      public NodePrinter.PrintInfo getPrintInfo(javafx.print.PageLayout pageLayout)
      Determines the scale and the number of rows and columns needed to print the determined contents of the component
      Parameters:
      pageLayout - the PageLayout that defines the printable area of a page.
      Returns:
      a PrintInfo instance that encapsulates the computed values for scale, number of rows and columns.
